name: Prologue
desc: You awake on an unfamiliar world, surrounded by debris. Your space suit is damaged. Nothing else matters until you can stabilize your condition.

name: Repressurized escape pod
desc: A small space where you can take off your helmet and plan your next move.

name: Intact Suit
desc: With your suit intact you have a chance to breathe. You can remember the evacuation alarms. Were you the only one who didn't escape in time?

name: Solitary Magic
desc: Some say the study of magic doesn't truly begin until apprenticeship ends. People say a lot of things.
